review.reviewBody: Great classic sub and taste how a sub should!

First time I tried Mr Sub. The takeaways :
1) The bread is horrible ! It easily fell apart. Zero doughy texture. None!
2) Ordered the seafood sub. Hardly any seafood to be found !?
I don’t know how they stay in business but they will absolutely not receive my patronage.
bread was stale lettuce was brown bag was wet and torn at the bottom really not impressed
It's a worse Subway, and Subway is already pretty bad.
The bottom half of the sub was so thin, it was breaking apart - and half of the veggies were entirely on the inside half, and the meat was on the outside half. I had to reassemble everhthing.
